title: Artificial ventilation shaft- A bathroom, water closet, staircase or store/prayer room may abut on t
clause_text: Artificial ventilation shaft- A bathroom, water closet, staircase or store/prayer room may abut on the ventilation shaft, the size of which shall not be less than the values given below:
